title: Illegal storage access made app crash
body:
Here's another illegal storage access error. This time it occured as I was inside of a 1-on-1 chat and I tried to scroll down to the bottom of the chat. This might be just a coincidence and not actually related to the scrolling at all.
Just leaving it here as yet another report of these things

```
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/pure/concurrency/threadpool.nim(377) slave
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/status/threads.nim(12) backgroundTaskWrapper
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/app/wallet/view.nim(422) backgroundTask
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/status/wallet/collectibles.nim(239) getStickers
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/status/wallet/collectibles.nim(218) getStickers
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/status/libstatus/stickers.nim(209) getAvailableStickerPacks
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/status/libstatus/stickers.nim(125) getPackData
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/src/status/libstatus/edn_helpers.nim(83) decode
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/edn.nim/src/edn.nim(1358) read
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/edn.nim/src/edn.nim(1355) read
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/edn.nim/src/edn.nim(1340) read
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/edn.nim/src/edn.nim(1315) read_internal
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/edn.nim/src/edn.nim(682) read_map
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/edn.nim/src/edn.nim(606) read_delimited_list
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/system/assign.nim(147) genericSeqAssign
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/system/assign.nim(111) genericAssign
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/system/assign.nim(76) genericAssignAux
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/system/assign.nim(106) genericAssignAux
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/system/gc.nim(251) unsureAsgnRef
/Users/pascalprecht/projects/status-im/nim-status-client/vendor/nimbus-build-system/vendor/Nim/lib/system/gc.nim(184) incRef
SIGSEGV: Illegal storage access. (Attempt to read from nil?)
QObject::~QObject: Timers cannot be stopped from another thread
QObject::~QObject: Timers cannot be stopped from another thread
make: *** [run-macos] Error 1
```
